sentences.english: The World Bank's full name is the International Bank for Reco truction and Development.
sentences.chinese: 世界银行的全称是国际复兴与开发银行。

sentences.english: AIDS is an acronym for"Acquired Immune Deficiency Syndrome."
sentences.chinese: 艾滋病的全称是“获得性免疫缺损综合征”。

sentences.english: What is the full name of Expo 2010?
The full name of the National Revolutionary Army New Fourth Army.
sentences.chinese: 全称国民革命军陆军新编第四军。

sentences.english: Victory horse polo game V. H. P.
sentences.chinese: G全称的含义是成功的马球运动。

sentences.english: The full name of DOTA is Defense of the Ancient.
Women, in contrast, usually maintain the full version of their names.
sentences.chinese: 正好相反，女性通常保持她们名字的全称。

sentences.english: The full name of the Vatican, "Vatican City State", was built in 1929.
sentences.chinese: 梵蒂冈全称“梵蒂冈城国”，建于1929年。

sentences.english: Its full form is Voice of America.
sentences.chinese: 它的全称形式是“美国之音”。

sentences.english: Invoice indicating that for accout of applicant with full name and address.
sentences.chinese: 发票上注明具有全称和地址的申请人的账户。

definition: to write characters in simplified form/the simplified form of a character/to abbreviate (a word or expression)/to write in simple language
to be collectively called/collective term/general designation
to belong to (a category)/to be attached to
to give a name to/to dub/to christen/to designate/named after/naming
